Pre-Game Insights: India finished the league stage as the unbeaten team in the tournament.
New Zealand had a topsy-turvy tournament but managed to secure a semifinal berth by beating Sri Lanka in their final match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a rematch of the 2019 World Cup last-four clash where New Zealand defeated India.
The live streaming of the match was available on Disney+ Hotstar.
